ygData.subject: Re: Bard Superstitions?
ygData.msgSnippet: I would be the first to humbly agree that dying is greatest reason why I cannot level.  Even with Verants change to reduce the amount of xp you lose when you
ygData.messageBody:
I would be the first to humbly agree that dying is greatest reason why I
cannot level. Even with Verants change to reduce the amount of xp you
lose when you die, I still lost 1/3 of a bubble dying to a stupid
basement train last night. At least I got my level, though it took at
least another to earn it back =(. Perhaps it is time to be less noble
and more parts chicken. It seems that I die more often when trying to
care people, perhaps it would be better to be known as Treilanin the you
yellow bellied chicken .... Nah I think not =).

Treilanin Loreweaver
Honour Guard, Karana
